text: Lionheart is a 2018 Nigerian drama movie directed by first time director Genevieve Nnaji (who also stars). It also stars Nkem Owoh, Pete Edochie, Onyeka Onwenu, and Kanayo O. Kanayo. It was distributed by Netflix. The film was bought by Netflix on 7 September 2018. It is the first Netflix original movie produced in Nigeria. == Other websites == * == References == Category:2018 drama movies Category:Nigerian movies Category:Netflix movies
title: Lionheart (2018 movie)
